name: screenshot-to-eagle
title: Screenshot to Eagle
description: macOS Screenshot auto save to Eagle.
author: leonwong282

commands.name: shot-to-eagle
commands.title: Shot to Eagle
commands.subtitle: Screenshot save to Eagle
commands.description: Take a screenshot and automatically save it to Eagle

commands.name: select-folder
commands.title: Select Eagle Folder
commands.subtitle: Choose target folder
commands.description: Select the Eagle folder where screenshots will be saved

preferences.name: eagleApiToken
preferences.title: Eagle API Token
preferences.description: Your Eagle Web API token (optional, find in Eagle settings)

preferences.name: folderId
preferences.title: Target Folder ID
preferences.description: Eagle folder ID where screenshots will be saved (optional, leave empty for root)

preferences.name: defaultMode
preferences.title: Default Screenshot Mode
preferences.description: The default mode for taking screenshots

preferences.name: autoTags
preferences.title: Auto Tags
preferences.description: Tags to automatically add to screenshots (comma-separated)

preferences.name: includeCursor
preferences.title: Include Cursor
preferences.label: Include mouse cursor in screenshots
preferences.description: Whether to include the mouse cursor in screenshots

preferences.name: playSound
preferences.title: Screenshot Sound
preferences.label: Play sound when taking screenshot
preferences.description: Whether to play the camera sound effect

preferences.name: timedDelay
preferences.title: Timed Delay (seconds)
preferences.description: Delay in seconds for timed screenshot mode

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
